text: Carlina Rivera (born January 3, 1984) is an American politician. She represents 2nd district of the New York City Council since 2018. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Rivera was a member of the Democratic Socialists of America and supported Bernie Sanders in his 2016 presidential campaign. In June 2022, she announced she would run for the United States House of Representatives for New York's 10th congressional district in the 2022 election. She lost the Democratic nomination in the August 2022 primaries. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Carlina Rivera
